title: How to write and publish a research paper based on my final year project - Quora

response.answer_text: How to write: Introduce your topic and highlight the significance of your study. Review existing literature related to your study and find the research gap. List the objectives of your study. Explain the methodology you have adopted in your study. Discuss the major findings of your study in the results section. Last but not the least, mention the limitations of your study and scope for further research. How to publish: Talk to your professor. Get a listing of reputed journals in your area. Select the journal you want to publish your paper in. Study their submission guidelines and make necessary corrections and adjustments. Submit your paper and wait patiently for its review. Based on the reviews received, make final modifications and re-submit. It will take time and it definitely isn’t easy but you can do it. Good luck! :)

The final project paper writing is an essential stage in a student’s life so you have to be prepared for it. Every year we get some knowledge in the university which can help us to deal with the scientific writings and make them even better. University life prepares us for a more profound life of an academic and it is normal. So you should analyze everything and make notes in order to save them for the future. This knowledge is really important and it has to be memorized.  In order to make your project better you have to do such things: use some online grammar checking tools to proofread your grammar and spellinghighlight the main ideas and work on themprovide some arguments and check their truthfulnessThese little recommendations will make your project flawless so do not hesitate to use them and a lot of others. The achievement of happiness is in your own hands.

It would be a good idea to confirm with your Institute to know about their policy on publishing your research work externally. After getting the necessary permission you can self publish your work through Partridge India publishing or Notion Press.
